src:
直擊！沈玉琳背著老婆　大膽聞解婕翎腳味
06 Nov 2019, 10:40 by 娛樂組
「Footer除臭襪」品牌為衝高買氣，祭出總獎項高達百萬的抽獎活動，首獎為價值30幾萬的勞力士名錶，並請來荒謬大師沈玉琳擔任活動推薦人，昨（5日）該品牌粉絲專頁直播公布第一波獎項得獎名單，大方送出最大獎LV精品包。
活動由沈玉琳擔任主持人，潘若迪和解婕翎擔任嘉賓，2個男人直接在節目中使出撩妹金句，沈玉琳甚至大膽聞解婕翎腳味，並讚「散發果香味」，讓解直呼「太誇張了！」。
有趣的是，潘若迪在現場帶2人跳有氧舞蹈，但沈玉琳招架不住，跳到氣喘吁噓，瞎扯眼前已經看到阿公；隨後解婕翎送上苦茶為沈玉琳消火解熱，潘若迪藉機爆料沈玉琳火氣大、要治療痔瘡，笑翻所有人。


沈玉琳主持直播節目，竟大膽聞解婕翎腳味。（footer 提供）

此外，當天陸續送出3台伊萊克斯吸塵器、5台Dyson吹風機、1台Apple Watch、2台Philips氣炸鍋、2台Nintendo Switch，壓軸獎項為價值將近5萬元的 LV精品包，由沈玉琳親自call-out給幸運得主，送出驚喜大獎。
「Footer除臭襪」品牌週活動從1日起至11日止，官網及直營門市同步優惠，合作通路也另有活動，大獎包含勞力士名錶、iphone 11、現金10萬、台北關島雙人來回機票、Tokuyo按摩椅等，業者可以說是卯足全力。Footer行銷部經理徐煒傑表示：「這次為慶祝Footer邁向第7年，2019更跨足越南市場，成為台灣除臭襪品牌中，第一家開發越南市場的公司，意義非凡；所以今年特別加碼單筆消費滿2,000就可參加抽獎活動，獎項全是國際知名品牌，希望能藉此回饋老顧客，同時也吸引新客目光焦距」。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 10:39
text:
Direct hit! Shen Yulin carrying her wife and daring to smell her feet
06 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Entertainment Group
The brand of "Footer Deodorant Socks" is a high-stakes lottery, offering a total prize-winning prize-winning event of up to one million. The first prize is a Rolex watch worth 300,000, and the ridiculous master Shen Yulin is invited as the event recommender. Day) The brand fan page broadcasted the first wave of awards and won the biggest prize LV boutique package.
The event was hosted by Shen Yulin, and Pan Ruodi and Jie Yu served as guests. Two men directly made a slogan in the program. Shen Yulin even dared to smell the scent and praised the fruit scent. "too exaggerated!".
Interestingly, Pan Ruodi took 2 aerobic dances on the spot, but Shen Yulin couldn't stand it, jumped to panting and screaming, and saw the grandfather before the eyes; then he sent the bitter tea to Shen Yulin to dispel the heat, Pan Ruodi took the opportunity to break the news. Shen Yulin is very angry, wants to treat hemorrhoids, and laughs at everyone.


Shen Yulin presided over the live broadcast, and she was bold enough to hear the stench. (provided by footer)

In addition, three Electrolux vacuum cleaners, five Dyson hair dryers, one Apple Watch, two Philips gas fryers, and two Nintendo Switchs were delivered on the same day. The finale was a LV boutique bag worth nearly 50,000 yuan. Shen Yulin personally Call-out gives the lucky winner a surprise prize.
The "Footer Deodorant Socks" brand week event will be held from the 1st to the 11th. The official website and the direct sales promotion will be synchronized. There will be other activities in the cooperation channel. The awards include Rolex watches, iphone 11, cash 100,000, and Taipei Guam. Tickets, Tokuyo massage chairs, etc., the industry can be said to be full of strength. Footer Marketing Manager Xu Yujie said: "This is to celebrate the fifth year of Footer, 2019 is more than the Vietnamese market, becoming the first company to develop the Vietnamese market in Taiwan's deodorant socks brand. It is of great significance; With a spending of 2,000, you can participate in the sweepstakes. The awards are all internationally renowned brands. I hope to give back to the old customers and attract new customers.
Update time|2019.11.06 10:39
